0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. 0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn.
